attributes.action: Pulse Oximetry Test for all Newborns in UK hospitals
attributes.additional_details:
The Pulse Oximeter is attached to the newborns finger during routine checks and it measures the level of Oxygen in the blood.

This inexpensive, quick and non-invasive test saved my daughters life. Had I have given birth to her in a different hospital the out come would have been completely different. As it currently stands, many families will not be as lucky.
